list.title: Your Chatbots
list.empty: No chatbots found. Create your first chatbot to get started.
list.error: Failed to load chatbots. Please try again.

create.title: Create New Chatbot
create.subtitle: Set up a new AI assistant for your business

form.name: Chatbot Name
form.nameHint: Give your chatbot a descriptive name
form.descriptionHint: Describe what this chatbot will help with
form.modelHint: Choose the AI model that best fits your needs
form.languageHint: Select the main language for interactions
form.purposeHint: What will this chatbot primarily be used for?

configure.title: Configure Chatbot
configure.systemPromptHint: Define how your chatbot should behave and respond
configure.temperatureHint: Higher values make responses more creative
configure.maxTokensHint: Limit how long responses can be
configure.knowledgeBaseHint: Select documents and products for this chatbot
configure.integrationsHint: Connect to external platforms and services
